text: Lachemilla jamesonii is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==Sources== * Romoleroux, K. & Pitman, N. 2004. Lachemilla jamesonii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
